title: Grundlagen der Elektrostatik
descriptionStart:
Are you ready for a trip into the world of electrostatics?

In this task, you will learn the basics of electrostatics.
descriptionEnd: You have learned the basics of electrostatics!

steps.text: Electric charges are always a multiple of the **elementary charge**.
The **total field strength** of an arrangement consisting of several charges is obtained by *multiplying* the contributions of the individual charges.
In a *closed* system, the sum of the charges is always constant.
Charges of *different* signs repel each other.

You did it!


The basics are no longer foreign to you!
